Package com.kamontat.model.management

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cache
    This class for save the object into file and can restore every time
    Easy to use and manage
    1) call method loadCache(file name) to getLog name of the file cache
    2) and than there have 4 method that you can use it saveToFile(object) - must be sure that object implements Serializable. loadFromFile(class) - you can specify return class by pass in parameter. isExist() - to check that cache file is exist or not. delete() - delete cache file.
    Device  
    FileUtil
    this class is file api you can easy to use in many way this class contain some of method but all of them is static method so you don't need to assign everything to use it
    Location  
    Size
